list.description:
БМП-2. Исторические прицельные сетки для прицела наводчика и визира ПТРК.

Прицельные сетки под БПК-1-42 и 9Ш119М1. Шкалы "БР" пристреляны под подкалиберную ленту, а не бронебойную. Отдельно назначить разные сетки на пушку и ПТУР не получится на данный момент. Да, в жизни прицельная сетка пушки горит жёлтым, либо её вообще не видно. Сделано под разрешение 1920х1080, если это на что-то влияет.

Сетка ПТУРа не моя, позаимствовал тут https://live.warthunder.com/post/708194/ru/

Изменено 09.05.2024. Подсветка жёлтым теперь всегда включена. Скорректирован оттенок сетки.

#bmp2...

минималистичный прицел для быстрого прицеливания на разных дистанций
работает на все танки

minimalistic sight for quick aiming at different distances
works on all tanks

TIRAN 4 SHARIR SIGHT REMAKE!!!

Hello guys, once again, long ago i didnt do anything about sights.
But today i finally come back after touching a lot of grass, to remake my first sight that was unhistorical unfortunately, it was for the normal tiran 4. But now i found a image of a real spreadsheet from the tiran 4sh and tiran 5sh, so now there its finally an historical sight!!

here all those rare letters meaning:

- תקביל = coaxial
- איינ = smoke
- מעיך = HESH (squash)
- חייש = APDS/APFSDS (subcaliber)
- חלול = HEAT-FS
- קו ח.ק. = idk lol, something like "kh....

Артиллерийский прицел на расстояние 3.6км.
*1 деление = 10м
*Вычислитель дистанции по силуэту танка

Лучший прицел для игры артой, вычисляя дистанцию с помощью БПЛА.
Прицел без погрешности на любую технику с плохой баллистикой. (не подходит для большинства техники т.к. шкала расстояния не будет полной)

Могу выложить прицел с вычислителем дистанции по силуэту для всей техники, но 1 деление в нем будет 100м, а не 10

#artillery #rangefinder #sight

some ranging sights I made, these use the squad-ping grid square method to range in on a target

they have helpful tables so the calculations are easier/more accurate

there are two sights, one with more gridlines ("arties") and one with less ("tanks"). I may make one in future for high velocity cannons

paste these into the "All tanks" folder and select in menu to use, make sure to alt-f9 after pasting to reload game files

#sights, #fictional, #rangefinder, #artillery, #sniping

radial sight for L3/33 CC

first line 250 m
second line 500 m
third line 750 m
fourth line 1000 m
fifth line 1250 m
sixth line 1500 m
seventh line 1750 m

How to install//如何安裝
For EN
<img src="...

#anime #azur_lane #azurlane #helena_meta #helena_azurlane #helena #universal

Helena META

"Where did you go? I'll know whether or not you're lying~"

Good evening, long time no see. After grinding the French tech tree for the last month, I was wondering why don't we have a lot of Rank VI French gunsights ? And where are the sights for the AMX-10RC and SK-105 ?

Scouring @RideR2's French sights archive and source table, I was able to piece out the M.581 gunsight. According to French Wikipedia, the M.581 was used by the AMX-40 prototypes. The earlier M.544 was used by the 105mm cannons and looks similar to the M.581. If you see the names, you can see M.545, 546 and 547. I do this in order to not let the sight files conflict and override eac...

SIGHT FOR LEOPARD 2s ONLY: I took this sight from someone and I changed it up so that the measuring range is better placed above the line and made the sight thickness more thicker. Link for original sight: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1099556/en/

1. download the ZIP Folder
2. creat a file withe the name (UserSights)
3. creat in the Folder (UserSights) a second Folder with the name (all_tanks) in War Thunder Folder
4. extract the ZIP Folder
5. copy all Files
6. paste all Files in the Folder War Thunder/UserSights/all_tanks
7. go to the game press Options, Chose Common Battle Settings, go to Use alternative sight grid, delete if you have
this file (exp_class_sight_1), press Add a grid Sight.
8. Chose the best size for your Tank
9. Enjoy !!!!!!!!!!
